description.zh-cn: 1973年初出现在无线电视翡翠台综艺节目《欢乐今宵》内的香港四人女子音乐组合。
description.en: A four-member Hong Kong female music group that appeared in the TVB Jade variety show 'Enjoy Yourself Tonight' in early 1973.

description.zh-cn: 香港资深影视演员，四朵金花成员之一，担任队长及负责选曲。
description.en: A veteran Hong Kong film and television actress, a member of the Four Golden Flowers, serving as the leader and responsible for song selection.

description.zh-cn: 香港资深电视演员及粤剧演员，四朵金花成员之一，负责编舞。
description.en: A veteran Hong Kong television and Cantonese opera actress, a member of the Four Golden Flowers, responsible for choreography.

description.zh-cn: 香港资深影视演员及歌手，四朵金花成员之一，负责服装及造型设计。
description.en: A veteran Hong Kong film and television actress and singer, a member of the Four Golden Flowers, responsible for costumes and styling.

description.zh-cn: 香港资深歌手、注册中医，四朵金花成员之一，负责和音。
description.en: A veteran Hong Kong singer and registered Chinese medicine practitioner, a member of the Four Golden Flowers, responsible for harmony.

description.zh-cn: 香港的广播电视台，是四朵金花的经纪公司。
description.en: A television broadcasting company in Hong Kong, which was the management agency for the Four Golden Flowers.

description.zh-cn: 无线电视翡翠台的晚间综艺节目，四朵金花在此节目中组成并演出。
description.en: A late-night variety show on TVB Jade where the Four Golden Flowers were formed and performed.

description.zh-cn: 香港艺人，时任《欢乐今宵》司仪，为“四朵金花”组合命名。
description.en: A Hong Kong artist and host of 'Enjoy Yourself Tonight' at the time, who named the group 'Four Golden Flowers'.

description.zh-cn: 四朵金花四位成员的歌唱老师。
description.en: The singing teacher for the four members of the Four Golden Flowers.

description.zh-cn: 香港的电视台，其电视剧《四千金》启发了“四朵金花”的组合名称概念。
description.en: A television station in Hong Kong, whose TV series 'Four Daughters' inspired the name concept for the 'Four Golden Flowers'.

description.zh-cn: 丽的映声的电视剧，其名称概念启发了“四朵金花”的组合名。
description.en: A TV series by Rediffusion Television, the concept of its name inspired the group name 'Four Golden Flowers'.

description.zh-cn: 香港词曲作家，为四朵金花同名代表作作曲及填词。
description.en: A Hong Kong songwriter and lyricist who composed and wrote the lyrics for the Four Golden Flowers' signature song of the same name.

description.zh-cn: 香港的唱片公司，四朵金花的唱片由其副牌丽歌唱片发行。
description.en: A record company in Hong Kong, whose sub-label Regal Records released the albums of the Four Golden Flowers.

description.zh-cn: 百代唱片 (香港)的副牌，曾发行四朵金花的唱片。
description.en: A sub-label of EMI (Hong Kong) that released albums for the Four Golden Flowers.

description.zh-cn: 1975年由丽的电视四位女艺员组成的女子音乐组合，以对撼四朵金花。
description.en: A female music group formed in 1975 by four female artists from Rediffusion Television to compete with the Four Golden Flowers.

description.zh-cn: 香港的电视台，组建了紫荆花合唱团以对撼四朵金花。
description.en: A television station in Hong Kong that formed the Bauhinia Singers to compete with the Four Golden Flowers.

description.zh-cn: 由七位香港粤语片时代著名女演员结谊组成的团体，王爱明是成员之一。
description.en: A sworn sisterhood group formed by seven famous actresses from the Hong Kong Cantonese cinema era, of which Wong Oi-ming was a member.

description.zh-cn: 四朵金花组合的出身地和主要活跃地区。
description.en: The place of origin and main area of activity for the Four Golden Flowers.

description.zh-cn: 沈殿霞是四朵金花的成员，担任队长并负责选曲。
description.en: Lydia Shum was a member of the Four Golden Flowers, serving as the leader and responsible for song selection.

description.zh-cn: 汪明荃是四朵金花的成员，负责编舞。
description.en: Liza Wang was a member of the Four Golden Flowers, responsible for choreography.

description.zh-cn: 王爱明是四朵金花的成员，负责服装及造型设计。
description.en: Wong Oi-ming was a member of the Four Golden Flowers, responsible for costume and styling design.

description.zh-cn: 张德兰是四朵金花的成员，负责和音。
description.en: Teresa Cheung was a member of the Four Golden Flowers, responsible for harmony vocals.

description.zh-cn: 四朵金花是无线电视旗下的女子音乐组合，由其担任经纪公司。
description.en: The Four Golden Flowers was a female music group under Television Broadcasts Limited (TVB), which served as their management agency.

description.zh-cn: 四朵金花是在综艺节目《欢乐今宵》中组成并进行歌舞演出的组合。
description.en: The Four Golden Flowers was a group formed and performing song and dance numbers on the variety show 'Enjoy Yourself Tonight'.

description.zh-cn: 时任《欢乐今宵》司仪的谭炳文将该组合命名为“四朵金花”。
description.en: Tam Ping-man, then host of 'Enjoy Yourself Tonight', named the group 'Four Golden Flowers'.

description.zh-cn: 据汪明荃回忆，组合名称的概念源自她于丽的映声拍摄的电视剧《四千金》。
description.en: According to Liza Wang, the concept for the group's name originated from the TV series 'Four Daughters' which she filmed at Rediffusion Television.

description.zh-cn: 沈殿霞师随歌唱老师许佩学习唱歌。
description.en: Lydia Shum studied singing under the tutelage of singing teacher Hui Pui.

description.zh-cn: 汪明荃师随歌唱老师许佩学习唱歌。
description.en: Liza Wang studied singing under the tutelage of singing teacher Hui Pui.

description.zh-cn: 王爱明师随歌唱老师许佩学习唱歌。
description.en: Wong Oi-ming studied singing under the tutelage of singing teacher Hui Pui.

description.zh-cn: 张德兰师随歌唱老师许佩学习唱歌。
description.en: Teresa Cheung studied singing under the tutelage of singing teacher Hui Pui.

description.zh-cn: 苏翁为四朵金花创作了同名代表歌曲《四朵金花》。
description.en: So Yung composed the signature song of the same name for the Four Golden Flowers.

description.zh-cn: 丽歌唱片是百代唱片 (香港)的副牌。
description.en: Regal Records was a sub-label of EMI (Hong Kong).

description.zh-cn: 丽歌唱片于1975年发行了四朵金花的专辑。
description.en: Regal Records released albums for the Four Golden Flowers in 1975.

description.zh-cn: 紫荆花合唱团是丽的电视为对撼四朵金花而成立的竞争对手组合。
description.en: The Bauhinia Singers was a rival group formed by Rediffusion Television to compete with the Four Golden Flowers.

description.zh-cn: 丽的电视组建了紫荆花合唱团以对撼无线电视的四朵金花。
description.en: Rediffusion Television founded the Bauhinia Singers to compete with TVB's Four Golden Flowers.

description.zh-cn: 王爱明是影坛“七公主”的成员之一。
description.en: Wong Oi-ming was one of the members of the film industry's 'Seven Princesses'.
